welcome_message_body: Welcome to Naha, Japan! Get ready to be charmed by this vibrant city known for its rich history, beautiful beaches, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Naha has to offer.

restaurants.name: わたんじ 通堂町
restaurants.description: わたんじ 通堂町 is a japanese restaurant located in 那覇市.

restaurants.name: Yuunangii (ゆうなんぎい)
restaurants.description: Yuunangii (ゆうなんぎい) is a japanese restaurant located in 那覇市.

restaurants.name: YANG KYOU FANG (燕郷房)
restaurants.description: YANG KYOU FANG (燕郷房) is a szechuan restaurant located in 那覇市.

restaurants.name: Matsumoto (まつもと)
restaurants.description: Matsumoto (まつもと) is a shabu-shabu restaurant located in 那覇市.

restaurants.name: Doraemon (どらえもん)
restaurants.description: Doraemon (どらえもん) is a noodle restaurant located in 那覇市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naha Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Naha Airport is dedicated to flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Naha Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kadena AB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kadena AB Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kerama Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kerama Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
